Package com.github.tadukoo.view.lookandfeel

package com.github.tadukoo.view.lookandfeel
Contains the TadukooLookAndFeel, which allows you to customize the Look & Feel more easily through the use of the TadukooTheme class and TadukooThemeFactory. You can customize the paints, fonts, shapes, borders, and even swap out entire Component UI classes if those customizations aren't enough for you.
  • Related Packages

    Description
    com.github.tadukoo.view
    A collection of useful view-related utilities
    com.github.tadukoo.view.lookandfeel.componentui
    Contains the Component UI classes used in Tadukoo Look & Feel
  • Class
    Description
    TadukooLookAndFeel
    Tadukoo Look & Feel is a Look & Feel currently extending MetalLookAndFeel that allows for easier customization of the Look & Feel.
    TadukooTheme
    Theme class for TadukooLookAndFeel.
    TadukooTheme.TadukooThemeBuilder
    Builder for TadukooTheme.
    TadukooThemeFactory
    Tadukoo Theme Factory provides some standard TadukooThemes and TadukooThemeBuilders, along with some util methods for making your own TadukooTheme.
    TitlePosition
    An enum used for Title Position (for Titled Borders)
